description: Ubrelvy tablets are used to treat migraine headaches in adults, with or without aura. Works by blocking CGRP protein in nerve endings.
side_effects: nausea, sleepiness, dry mouth, allergic reactions, difficulty breathing, swelling
therapeutic_effect: migraine pain relief, migraine symptom reduction
overdose: Can be fatal. Symptoms include irregular heart rhythm, feeling faint, seizures, coma
storage: Store at room temperature between 68°F to 77°F (20°C to 25°C)
drug_interactions: Strong CYP3A4 inhibitors like ketoconazole, clarithromycin, itraconazole should not be taken together
summary: Reviews indicate moderate effectiveness for acute migraine treatment with common side effects of nausea and drowsiness. Many users report pain relief within 2 hours but effectiveness varies between individuals.

description: Nurtec ODT is used to treat acute migraine attacks and prevent episodic migraines by blocking CGRP receptors in the brain
side_effects: nausea, indigestion, stomach pain, allergic reactions, delayed hypersensitivity reactions
storage: Keep tablets in original blister packaging, store at room temperature between 68°F to 77°F
drug_interactions: Strong CYP3A4 inhibitors, P-gp inhibitors, avoid grapefruit juice
summary: Reviews show effectiveness for both acute treatment and prevention of migraines. Common side effects include nausea but generally well tolerated.

description: Qulipta is used to help prevent episodic and chronic migraine headaches in adults by blocking CGRP protein
side_effects: nausea, constipation, fatigue, weight loss, allergic reactions
storage: Store at room temperature away from moisture and heat
drug_interactions: Strong CYP3A4 inhibitors/inducers, cyclosporine, St. John's wort
summary: Reviews indicate good effectiveness for migraine prevention with 54% reduction in monthly migraine days. Weight loss and nausea are common side effects.

description: Paracetamol is an analgesic and antipyretic drug used to temporarily relieve mild-to-moderate pain and fever
side_effects: allergic reactions, skin rashes, liver damage with overdose
overdose: Can cause serious liver damage. Symptoms include paleness, nausea, sweating, vomiting within 24 hours
summary: Reviews indicate effectiveness for mild pain and fever relief. Generally well tolerated when taken as directed.

description: Diclofenac is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to treat pain and inflammation
side_effects: nausea, indigestion, stomach pain, dizziness, drowsiness, headache
storage: Store at room temperature away from moisture and heat
drug_interactions: Aspirin, blood thinners, heart/blood pressure medications, other NSAIDs
summary: Reviews show good effectiveness for pain and inflammation with common GI side effects. Risk of cardiovascular events with long-term use.

description: Amitriptyline is a tricyclic antidepressant used to treat depression, insomnia, migraine prevention, and pain
side_effects: drowsiness, dry mouth, weight changes, constipation, blurred vision
therapeutic_effect: depression treatment, pain relief, migraine prevention
storage: Store at room temperature away from moisture and heat
drug_interactions: MAO inhibitors, other antidepressants, heart medications
summary: Reviews indicate effectiveness for multiple conditions but significant side effects. Takes 4-6 weeks for full effect.

description: Hydroxyzine is an antihistamine used to treat anxiety disorders and allergic conditions
overdose: Symptoms include severe drowsiness, nausea, vomiting, uncontrolled muscle movements, seizures
storage: Store at room temperature away from moisture and heat
drug_interactions: Other sedating medications, alcohol, MAO inhibitors
summary: Reviews show moderate effectiveness for anxiety and allergies but significant drowsiness. Short-term use recommended.

description: Tramadol is an opioid medication used to treat moderate to moderately severe chronic pain
overdose: Can be fatal. Symptoms include slow breathing, seizures, coma
storage: Store at room temperature away from moisture and heat
summary: Reviews indicate good pain relief but concerns about addiction potential. Side effects and withdrawal symptoms commonly reported.

description: Cyclobenzaprine is a muscle relaxant that works by blocking nerve impulses and pain sensations
side_effects: drowsiness, dry mouth, dizziness, fatigue, constipation
overdose: Can be fatal. Symptoms include severe drowsiness, fast heartbeats, tremors, agitation
storage: Store at room temperature away from moisture and heat
drug_interactions: MAO inhibitors, other muscle relaxants, alcohol, antidepressants
summary: Reviews show effectiveness for muscle spasms but significant drowsiness. Short-term use (2-3 weeks) recommended.

description: Duloxetine is a selective serotonin and norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor antidepressant
side_effects: nausea, dry mouth, constipation, drowsiness, fatigue, insomnia
therapeutic_effect: depression treatment, anxiety relief, pain management
overdose: Symptoms include vomiting, dizziness, seizures, fast heartbeats, fainting, coma
storage: Store at room temperature away from moisture and heat
summary: Reviews indicate effectiveness for multiple conditions but significant withdrawal effects. Takes 6-8 weeks for full antidepressant effect.
